actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the maximum taxable income for the 15 percent rate bracket, to replace the Consumer Price Index with the national average wage index for purposes of cost-of-living adjustments, to lessen the impact of the noncorporate alternative minimum tax, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) increase the maximum taxable income for the 15 percent rate bracket; (2) replace the Consumer Price Index with the national average wage index for purposes of cost-of-living adjustments; and (3) adjust for inflation the exemption amounts used in calculating the alternative minimum tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the maximum taxable income for the 15 percent rate bracket, to replace the Consumer Price Index with the national average wage index for purposes of cost-of-living adjustments, to lessen the impact of the noncorporate alternative minimum tax, and for other purposes.
